Appointment secretary
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Battles & Tournaments: Appointment secretary
By torey_luvullo on Saturday, October 6, 2001 - 06:26 am:

i missed an important tourney with my naga the other day. i was so sure i had remembered the right day, in fact, that i saved before i went to battle, then went, only to discover that the battle had been last week. so my naga didnt beat the final big 5 member; that honor went to my raiden.

when i mentionned this to barronbrad, he told me that if you click on a future battle, fleria will register you for that battle and then remind you when it comes up on the schedule that you have a battle that week.

thanx brad! this is a useful feature.

By Crystal Pixie on Saturday, October 6, 2001 - 08:03 am:

Yes, like the time I was getting an accessory for a pixie and I forgot and had to wait another whole year. Umm, all you do is X to register? That's useful.

By torey luvullo on Saturday, October 6, 2001 - 08:35 am:

ya - put your arrow on the tourney you want to be reminded of, anytime within the next 11 months, and hit x. unfortunately, she only keeps track of one for you.

By Crystal Pixie on Saturday, October 6, 2001 - 08:51 am:

Yeah I already tried it. I have a battle reserved right now. Thanks anyway.

By Barronbrad on Saturday, October 6, 2001 - 10:22 am:

oh and also you cannot register a battle for a higher rank than you already are(ex if you are c rank you cannot register a b rank battle)

By Ray Gamer on Saturday, October 6, 2001 - 01:48 pm:

Wow, what a great feature!

Thanks Barronbrad!
